Text: I extracted the file, copied the sound folder, the acess and the active.dll to the original folder, but the game dont start. What am i doing wrong?

@Viktor6665

Did you update the game?
ViTALiTY's crack only works for the latest version of the game. Otherwise its keeps craching and complains about missing files.
If you used ViTALiTY's torrent to download the game, update patches can be found on the second iso.-file.
What version is this? The latest is 1.0.3.4.
